lead_paragraph: Long-suffering Chicago Cubs fans have finally gotten the World Series they waited 71 years for but the championship they have dreamt about for more than a century seemed as far away as ever on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: After Rout, Cubs World Series Dream Far Away as Ever
headline.main: After Rout, Cubs World Series Dream Far Away as Ever
